meanings.definition: A distinctive smell, especially an unpleasant one.
meanings.sent1: The odour of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The fresh odour of flowers greeted us as we entered the garden.
meanings.sent3: The odour of burnt popcorn always reminds me of movie nights gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The odour of fear hung heavy in the air as we approached the haunted house.
meanings.sent5: The pungent odour of vinegar made my eyes water.

meanings.definition: A quality or property characteristic of something or someone.
meanings.sent1: The odour of honesty was evident in her every word.
meanings.sent2: The odour of success surrounded the young entrepreneur.
meanings.sent3: His odour of mischief always gave away his pranks before he even started.
meanings.sent4: The odour of determination wafted from her as she tackled each challenge.
meanings.sent5: The odour of kindness in her actions warmed the hearts of all who knew her.
